title: The One About Weddings II
description:
Bob and Monét are talking weddings! Bob doesn't like them, Monét can't stop tearing up at them, and both of them have some hot takes about the music choices, dining experiences, and traditions.
Go to https://MasterClass.com/RIVALRY for 15% off MasterClass!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
